gene.function: FUNCTION: Component of the 40S ribosomal subunit.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:20159986}. Nucleus, nucleolus {ECO:0000269|PubMed:20159986}. Note=Localized in the granular component (GC) region of the nucleolus. Methylation is required for its localization in the GC region. Colocalizes with NPS1 in the GC region of the nucleolus.
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay [GO:0000184]
SRP-dependent cotranslational protein targeting to membrane [GO:0006614]
